member.summary: When implemented by a class, put the value from the mapped Property into to the .
member.param: The to put the value into.
The object that contains the value.
The index of the to start writing the values to.
member.remarks:
Implementors do not need to handle possibility of null values because this will only be called from
after it has checked for nulls.

member.name: T:Qi.Web.Mvc.NHModelBinder
member.summary: Nhibernate model biner

member.name: M:Qi.Web.Mvc.NHModelBinder.BindModel(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.Web.Mvc.ModelBindingContext)
member.summary: Binds the model by using the specified controller context and binding context.
member.param: The context within which the controller operates. The context information includes the controller, HTTP content, request context, and route data.
The context within which the model is bound. The context includes information such as the model object, model name, model type, property filter, and value provider.

member.name: M:Qi.Web.Mvc.NHModelBinder.RemoveWrapper(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext)
member.summary: Remvoe NH Session, but it nevery close the session.

member.name: M:Qi.Web.Mvc.NHModelBinder.CreateModel(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.Web.Mvc.ModelBindingContext,System.Type)
member.summary: Creates the specified model type by using the specified controller context and binding context.
member.returns: A data object of the specified type.
member.param: The context within which the controller operates. The context information includes the controller, HTTP content, request context, and route data.
The context within which the model is bound. The context includes information such as the model object, model name, model type, property filter, and value provider.
The type of the model object to return.

member.name: M:Qi.Web.Mvc.NHModelBinder.GetPropertyValue(System.Web.Mvc.ControllerContext,System.Web.Mvc.ModelBindingContext,System.ComponentModel.PropertyDescriptor,System.Web.Mvc.IModelBinder)
member.summary: Returns the value of a property using the specified controller context, binding context, property descriptor, and property binder.
member.returns: An object that represents the property value.
member.param: The context within which the controller operates. The context information includes the controller, HTTP content, request context, and route data.
The context within which the model is bound. The context includes information such as the model object, model name, model type, property filter, and value provider.

The descriptor for the property to access. The descriptor provides information such as the component type, property type, and property value. It also provides methods to get or set the property value.
An object that provides a way to bind the property.
